description:
Plenty of changes:
- Corrected song structure
- Reworked section titles
- Slight tempo decrease
- Lowered main guitar riff by an octave
- Added staccato notation for ease of reading
- Light corrections to all instruments
- Made drums readable
- A tremolo effect was present in the guitar solos (m. 61-64; 79-82 of Guitar 1) when viewed in TuxGuitar. Tremolo is not supported in Songsterr, so this section was replaced with a stream of 32nd notes.
